title: Support FLASH attribute animation (ink/paper swap at 2Hz)
Add size-based UTType filtering for .sna files
description: UTType com.hippietrail.sna currently matches ANY .sna file. Need to investigate if we can use UTTypeTagSpecification or custom size-checking mechanism to only match 49179-byte .sna files, leaving other .sna files (other emulator formats, different sizes) to other handlers.
